Name: Aggravation
Ingredients: 15 ml De Kuyper Crème de Cafe
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Garnish with dusting of nutmeg grated over cocktail.
Review: If you like Scotch and enjoy creamy drinks, you'll love this.
Nutrition: One serving of Aggravation contains 226 calories
